Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - Activity impairment score.
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - Are you currently employed (working for pay)?
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you actually work?
